About Projects

Hello

My name is Joshua Kemmerling and I am a builder of mobile and web stuff.

I am currently a senior UI developer at Projekt202, an interactive agency located in Austin, TX specializing in user centered design and development. I am the co-founder of Tasty Trailers, a new way to discover food trailers near you, on the go.

The "I" List

I am addicted to Sunkist orange soda and pizza. I like to play all sports. I am an Eagle Scout. I enjoy all things outdoors: climbing, camping, hiking, cycling. I have a cat named Moonpie.

Elsewhere

Github, LinkedIn
